item.title: CVE-2021-26630|2024-08-03T20:26:25.656Z -- handysoft%20co.%2Cltd -- handy%20groupware
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in HANDY Groupwareâ€™s ActiveX moudle allows attackers to download or execute arbitrary files. This vulnerability can be exploited by using the file download or execution path as the parameter value of the vulnerable function.
